    • Method Detail

      • get

        double get()
        Common interface for getting the current set speed of a speed controller.
        Returns:
        The current set speed. Value is between -1.0 and 1.0.

      • getSpeed

        default double getSpeed()
        Common interface for getting the current set speed of a speed controller.
        Returns:
        The current set speed. Value is between -1.0 and 1.0.

      • set

        default void set(double speed,
                 byte syncGroup)
        Common interface for setting the speed of a speed controller.
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed to set. Value should be between -1.0 and 1.0.
        syncGroup - The update group to add this Set() to, pending UpdateSyncGroup(). If 0, update immediately.

      • set

        void set(double speed)
        Common interface for setting the speed of a speed controller.
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed to set. Value should be between -1.0 and 1.0.

      • setSpeed

        default void setSpeed(double speed)
        Set the speed of the SpeedController
        Parameters:
        speed - the speed to set

      • setInverted

        void setInverted(boolean inverted)
        Set the inverted state of the speed controller.
        Parameters:
        inverted - true to invert the values sent to the motor.
